safetyTips: Post using Royal Mail or distanced collections from in store.
name: CRAFTSHIP ENTERPRISE CIC (MADE IN ASHFORD)
address: Made in Ashford, Unit 26, Park Mall, Ashford, TN24 8NY
description: Made in Ashford is a collaborative of local designer/makers and crafts people selling and supporting each other.  We are run by Craftship Enterprise CIC, a social enterprise aiming to help creativity to be accessible to everyone in the community and support small, local, creative businesses. We sell the products of our members through our bricks and mortar shop and website. Craftship Enterprise shares free online workshops and creative activities to anyone in the world. These are paid for through commission generated on sales in the shop and online. Order Online. Collection or Postal Delivery.
